name: Suck Squad
description:
Suck Squad is a multiplayer party game for up to four players. It features a variety of different skins, maps, and ridiculous 2D physics. To increase chaos, each player controls their character with a single key on the same keyboard!

-HOW TO PLAY: CONTROLS AND GOAL-

The goal of the game is to grab the rage bubble, which empowers your character. Once your character is powered up, touching another player will kill them. Make use of the many powerups and level hazards to be the last one standing! Blue turns with "LSHIFT," red controls with "/," green controls with "C," and yellow controls with "M."
